text: It was such a pleasure to again discuss in person at yesterdays ‘WatchParty’ hosted by @DataPublicsRUC where we watched and discussed some of the great research presented at this years #ICA21 https://t.co/jc9jBNUngK

urls.title: Great discussions characterised DataPublics ICA 'WatchParty'
urls.description: There was a constant buzzing at the four tables where 20 researchers today discussed several sides of datafication and its effects on media and the formation of publics. The occasion was this year’s ICA conference, which as last year has been made virtual, as the DataPublics team on Friday the 28th hosted a so-called ‘WatchParty’ where researchers from the Copenhagen area was invited to watch and discuss selected presentations from the conference.
